flavorText:

—Alux, Skysail defender

foreignData.name: Schlingentaktiker

foreignData.flavorText:
"Nuestras descargas no pretenden matar. Los enredamos y el suelo hace el resto".
—Álux, defensor de Puertoaéreo
foreignData.name: Estratega trampero
foreignData.text: Siempre que actives una habilidad de ciclo de una carta, gira la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Nous ne cherchons pas à les tuer. Nous les paralysons, et le sol s'occupe du reste. »
—Alux, défenseur de Vogueciel
foreignData.name: Tacticien aux collets
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que vous recyclez une carte, engagez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Le nostre raffiche non mirano a uccidere. Basta ostacolarli e il terreno farà il resto."
—Alux, difensore della Solcanembi

foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta cicli una carta, TAPpa una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario.

foreignData.flavorText:

――スカイセイルの防衛者、アルックス
foreignData.name: 罠の戦術家
foreignData.text: あなたがカードをサイクリングするたび、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。

foreignData.flavorText:
"우리는 죽이려고 사격을 하는 게 아냐. 상처만 입히면 나머지는 땅바닥이 처리해 주지."
—창공돛 수비병, 알룩스
foreignData.name: 덫 책략가
foreignData.text: 당신이 카드를 순환할 때마다, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Nossas saraivadas não são para matar. Enfraqueça-os o suficiente e o chão fará o resto."

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.name: 誘捕策士

name: Snare Tactician
originalText: Whenever you cycle a card, tap target creature an opponent controls.

rulings.text: Some cards with cycling have an ability that triggers when you cycle them, and some cards have an ability that triggers whenever you cycle any card. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.
Triggered abilities from cycling a card and the cycling ability itself aren’t spells. Effects that interact with spells (such as that of Cancel) won’t affect them.

You can cycle a card even if it has a triggered ability from cycling that won’t have a legal target. This is because the cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. This also means that if either ability is countered (with Disallow, for example), the other ability will still resolve.

text: Whenever you cycle a card, tap target creature an opponent controls.
